turkish_example_sentence: Biz o yüksek sesi duymasak daha huzurlu olurduk.
english_example_sentence: If we were not to hear that loud sound, we would be more peaceful.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не слышали тот громкий звук, мы были бы спокойнее.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz o yüksek sesi ______ daha huzurlu olurduk.
